system.descriptor: The ability to read and write in any language the user speaks. Every day activities do not require a test, although situations involving regional variation, damaged/archaeic writings, or colloqialisms may need one.
system.uses: Skill Test: Comprehend Text, further DoS may elicit hidden or "Between the line" meanings.

description.value: The ability to read and write in any language the user speaks. Every day activities do not require a test, although situations involving regional variation, damaged/archaeic writings, or colloqialisms may need one.
